game_description: Aesthetic experiences are brought into the therapeutic realm using lessons from neuroscience and psychology. Visitations makes use of techniques such as binaural beats, subtle strobing, form constants, and includes a guided meditation, a dream induction, and a soundtrack developed by a healer with experience leading traditionally inspired ceremonies. Visitations creates a set & setting which allow users to turn inwards and explore their own stories and mental states.
review_1: It has some room to improve but there is some quality tools here for the price. Hope to see some updates.
review_2: My favourite VR meditation app. Nice choice of music or "body scan" guided meditation (no hokey "inspirational" talk, thank goodness). Several visually pleasing and engaging scenes to choose between. I especially like: - Forest river - Neon mandelas - Crystal contours - Drifting Nebula Some of the other scenes (e.g. "soft flowing" and "sunset beach") seem promising, but need a visual upgrade. Something is very wrong with "Spider's Nest" -- too much of the foreground remains fixed on the screen even when moving one's head, which is headache-inducing. I hope that's fixed, and more scenes are added (or visually improved). Additional soothing background music options would also be very welcomed. Still, it's already excellent value at just $10 (with no ongoing subscription fees, unlike some of its competitors). Highly recommended for relaxation / sleep preparation.
review_3: The visualizations are wonderfully done. Hypnotic and soothing to look at. I wish there were a few more scenes and maybe a few variations of the distraction game. Unfortunately I assume that will be unlikely considering this app is probably pretty niche.
